ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.2_0: At that time the nuns were giving the full admission to unmarried girls who were more than twenty years old, but who had not trained for two years in the six rules.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.4_0: They don’t know what is allowable and what is not.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.5_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.6_0: “How can nuns give the full admission to unmarried girls who are more than twenty years old, but who haven’t trained for two years in the six rules?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.11_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.13_0: and after giving a teaching he addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.14_0: “Monks, approval is required for an unmarried girl who is eighteen years old to train in the six rules for two years.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.15_0: And the designation should be given like this.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.16_0: After approaching the Sangha of nuns, that unmarried girl who is eighteen years old should put her upper robe over one shoulder and pay respect at the feet of the nuns. She should then squat on her heels, raise her joined palms, and say,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.17_0: ‘Venerables, I, so-and-so, an unmarried girl who is eighteen years old, am training under Venerable so-and-so. I ask the Sangha for approval to train for two years in the six rules.’
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.18_0: And they should ask a second
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.19_0: And they should ask a third time.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.20_0: A competent and capable nun should then inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.21_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.22_0: She asks the Sangha for approval to the unmarried girl so-and-so who is eighteen years old to train in the six rules for two years.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.23_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should give approval to the unmarried girl so-and-so who is eighteen years old to train in the six rules for two years.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.25_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.26_0: She asks the Sangha for approval to the unmarried girl so-and-so who is eighteen years old to train in the six rules for two years.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.27_0: The Sangha gives approval to the unmarried girl so-and-so who is eighteen years old to train in the six rules for two years.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.28_0: Any nun who approves of giving approval to the unmarried girl so-and-so who is eighteen years old to train in the six rules for two years should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.29_0: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.30_0: The Sangha has given approval to the unmarried girl so-and-so who is eighteen years old to train in the six rules for two years.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.31_0: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.32_0: That unmarried girl who is eighteen years old should be told to say this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.33_0: ‘I undertake to abstain from killing living beings for two years without transgression.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.34_0: I undertake to abstain from eating at the wrong time for two years without transgression.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.35_0: Then, after rebuking those nuns in many ways for being difficult to support ... the Buddha said,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.36_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:1.37.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to an unmarried girl who is more than twenty years old, but who has not trained in the six rules for two years, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.5_0: A girl who is more than twenty years old:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.6_0: who has reached twenty years of age.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.8_0: novice nun is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.12_0: or has been given to him, or he hasn’t given their training, or he has been ejected.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.15_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.16_0: for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.17_0: and the last announcement is made by two announcements.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.18_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.19_0: while the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.20.1_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.21_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.22_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.23_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but they perceive it as legitimate, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.24_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.25_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and they perceive it as such, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.27_0: if she gives the full admission to an unmarried girl who is more than twenty years old, and who has trained in the six rules for two years;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.29_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc72:2.30_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
